platen-button-link.title: Button
platen-button-link.description: Add a button linking to another page or external site.

fields.name: selection
fields.title: Button Text: This displays on the button itself.

fields.name: destination
fields.title: Button Destination: Specify the URL this button should lead to. Alternatively, specify the dot-path of the preset you want to use after the prefix `preset:`, like `preset:foo`.

fields.name: class
fields.title: Class List: Specify any classes to add to the button in a space-separated list. Each class must have a period (`.`) prefix.

fields.name: preset
fields.title: Preset: Specify the dot-path of the button preset you want to use, if any.

fields.name: style
fields.title: Style: Specify the dot-path of the button style you want to use, if any.
